author: rjung
msg: Add Token Poller protection to our list
early during startup to prevent the occasional
Token Poller thread being started with the web app

author: rjung
msg: Preparation be fore adding a new leak prevention feature:
change order of features to alphabetic like in listener docs.

author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-111: Fixed careless exception handling as suggested by Dennis Sosnoski.

author: veithen
msg: Prepared Axis2 for application of patch for WSCOMMONS-111. RuntimeExceptions will no longer be caught (and transformed to OMExceptions) in StAXOMBuilder#next(). Therefore, they need to be caught by Axis2 if there is a requirement to react to RuntimeExceptions thrown by the Axiom code.
